attributes.action: Pass law to make cyclists wear high vis and identification numbers.
attributes.additional_details: Because cyclists are a danger to themselves and other road users, with thier arrogant behaviour, not all of them!  Lack of being visible  to other road users.
attributes.background: Cyclists using the public highways be made mandatory to wear high visibility clothing, lights and identification numbers,so they can be reported for highway misuse  and not riding to a safe standard.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition calling for a similar action: 

Introduce new requirements for cyclists/e-scooters: visible ID, licences, etc
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585474

Create legal requirement for all cyclists to wear a helmet and other safety gear
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592164
